trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur wishes to welcome Pelupelu patrons up the mountain.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy mountain guide in Worlar's Echo.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested item to the intrepid hiker.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_SEQ_03<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy mountain guide in Worlar's Echo.

TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the intrepid hiker)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Great news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Nopli tells me no few Pelupelu wish to visit Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>I inquired with Fahrafahr, and she agrees that our beautiful altar ought to live on in the memories of any and all who would behold it.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>Do you recall that mountaineering paraphernalia you made for us? Well, it seems word of mouth has attracted more prospective hikers from Wachunpelo.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>Worlar's Echo is preparing to receive them, but they require the aid of an artisan, and I'd like to send you.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>When you arrive, speak to the mountain guide for your assignment. Safe travels!
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTPEL05359_000_010<tab>I'm told you'll be providing me with the equipment I need to make the climb. I shall expect your very best work!
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTPEL05359_100_010<tab>The moment I heard about Zirgorteh the Open-armed, I knew I had to see it for myself. For that, I'll need to gear up!

TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_011<tab>Thank you for coming down, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This merchant placed an order with me, but I find I'm struggling to craft equipment for such small frames.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_012<tab>To complete this set of mountaineering paraphernalia, could you craft a pair of goggles to shield the eyes from the biting winds?
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_013<tab>To complete this set of mountaineering paraphernalia, could you craft a pair of small-yet-sturdy snowshoes?
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_014<tab>To complete this set of mountaineering paraphernalia, could you prepare a serving of rations to be stored in an insulated container?
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_016<tab>In return, I'll furnish you with the materials you require. Say the word if you run short.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_017<tab>By all means, deliver the completed set directly to our Pelu friend here.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_020<tab>Having some trouble? I understand completely. Take these.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTPEL05359_000_025<tab>Oh, I can't wait to see what you've made for me!
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTPEL05359_000_026<tab>How did it go? Can I see it yet?
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTPEL05359_000_027<tab>A worthy investment of coin, if I do say so myself. So long as I have this, I need fear no icy mountain trail!
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_028<tab>The rumors don't do you justice, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I can but admire your craftsmanship.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_MTYOK05359_000_029<tab>Now then, let us begin the long climb!

TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_030<tab>Great work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A fully outfitted Pelupelu passed by just now, chatting pleasantly with the mountain guide on their way to the Breathless Altar.
TEXT_BANYOK124_05359_VUYARGUR_000_031<tab>Should anyone else take an interest in Zirgorteh the Open-armed, I hope we can count on you again.
